name: hamn_auth
description: An auth system made with Hyper-Express, Alpine.js, Mongo, and Node.js. This is a test to see if I can rewrite a basic CRUD app replacing Express and Angular with Hyper-Express and Alpine.js. Also uses Bulma.io for css and Pinecone.js for Alpine routing. I may also make a phone version of the front end with capacitor.
author: Taylor Wright
